Cheating.description: Any form of cheating (using external software or files for an unfair advantage)

options.Godmode: You will be reporting this player for using godmode, making them invincible
options.Aimbot: You will be reporting this player for using an aimbot - please only use this if you are sure the player is using an aimbot
options.Weapon Hacks: You will be reporting this player for using weapon hacks, such as infinite ammo, damage boosting, etc
options.Other: Allows you to enter a custom message about this form of cheating if it doesn't fit the other options

Exploiting.description: Any behaviour that includes or is more closely related to exploiting server features or bugs

options.Other: Allows you to enter a custom message about the exploiting, such as what the player is doing and how (or why) they are doing it

Griefing.description: Any behaviour that includes or is more closely related to griefing other players

options.Harassment: You will be reporting this player for intentionally harassing another player, such as by following them around the map after being told to leave them alone
options.Drift Disturbance: You will be reporting this player for disturbing a drift zone, such as by blocking roads, spawning trailers, etc
options.Race Disturbance: You will be reporting this player for disturbing a race, such as by blocking roads, intentionally and repeatedly crashing into other players, etc
options.Other: Allows you to enter a custom message about the griefing behaviour if it doesn't fit the other option(s)

Hate Speech.description: Any chat behaviour that includes hate speech, racism, homophobia, etc

options.Racism: You will be reporting this player for using racial slurs and/or discriminating against race(s)
options.Homophobia: You will be reporting this player for using slurs and/or discriminating against a person's sexual orientation
options.Transphobia: You will be reporting this player for using slurs and/or discriminating against transgender people or those who do not conform to social gender roles
options.Other: Allows you to enter a custom message to better describe the behaviour

Inappropriate Username.description: Any username that is inappropriate, offensive, or otherwise violates the rules

options.Racism: You will be reporting this player for using racial slurs and/or discriminating against race(s) through their username
options.Homophobia: You will be reporting this player for using slurs and/or discriminating against a person's sexual orientation through their username
options.Transphobia: You will be reporting this player for using slurs and/or discriminating against transgender people or those who do not conform to social gender roles through their username
options.Inappropriate: You will be reporting this player for having a generally inappropriate username
options.Offensive: You will be reporting this player for having an offensive username
options.Other: Allows you to enter a custom message about the username

Verbal Abuse.description: Any form of verbal abuse, such as arguing, threats, etc

options.Arguing: You will be reporting this player for arguing with another player
options.Threats: You will be reporting this player for threatening another player
options.Harassment: You will be reporting this player for harassing another player
options.Other: Allows you to enter a custom message about the verbal abuse

Spamming.description: Any form of spamming, such as chat spam, voice spam, etc

options.Chat Spam: You will be reporting this player for excessively spamming the text chat
options.Voice Spam: You will be reporting this player for spamming the voice chat with offensive or annoying sounds with the intent to disrupt others
options.Other: Allows you to enter a custom message about the incident to better describe the behaviour of the player

Other.description: Any other behaviour that does not fit the other categories

options.Erotic behaviour: You will be reporting this player for engaging in sex discussions, erotic roleplay, etc
options.Other: Allows you to enter a custom message about the incident to better describe the behaviour of the player
